name: Goblin Slayer & the Dark Sword
description:
Let’s fight the evil goblins, where you play the role of a young female knight with the Dark Sword on a mission to hunt down the goblin army that terrorizes people in the dark age. From an ordinary girl transformed to a goblin slayer with idle clicker rpg gameplay. Go on an adventure and discover quests in various maps. Defeat the brutal dungeon boss. Pursue the path of the knight, the strongest hero. Slay thousand mobs and collect dark souls to awaken the power of the sword even further.
Starting off as a broken sword and then evolved to its utmost potential as an unmatched demon sword. Meet many of goblin mobs awaiting to fight you: guardian goblins, hunting goblins, or even the king of goblins. They are waiting for lost adventurers to kill and devour. These monsters all want to evolve. Thus, they need a large number of souls of the knights and warriors to develop their evil powers. They are divided into two groups: green goblins and red goblins. According to their status, green goblins are subordinates, low in strength, very greedy, gluttony, yet smart. There are great many of them. They craft goblin sword and make other magic weapons. Red goblins are the ruler. They inherite power from the Titan. They are very strong, big and ferocious and like to hunt and kill, preferring to target on larger monsters. They lead an army of goblins. In addition to the ugly goblins, you will also meet other monsters such as the cute slime, allowing you to experience the sense of fantasy. Destroy the Goblin Forest. Find out about the legend of the monster. Slash the monster mobs. Defeat the dungeon keepers.
You'll have nonstop fun with this exciting idle clicker game that gives you limitless farm possibilities even when you're resting or have afk! Just simple play by pressing Tap on the screen to let our anime style characters slash out in order to win and collect gold to keep unlocking the next sword. The farther you fight, the more rewards you get. Let's strive to fight in the knights tournament to acquire the ultimate sword! There are many swords for you to collect, such as the sword of light, the sword of shadow, the exotic samurai sword, and even the sword inherited from the legendary knight. Moreover, there is a wide variety of costumes for you to choose from. These costumes not only make you stand out, but also contain special powers that will enhance your abilities even more! And the most important of all is the Reincarnation system. With each Reincarnation, your character will be enormously stronger, continuously improve abilities, discover ways to develop your own skills and abilities to overcome obstacles. Be a knight in the shadows who protects the people in silence. Destroy the era of chaos. Pioneer the age of the knights. Unite the sword with the spirit and strive for the throne to become the strongest sword hero of all!

◆◆◆ Game Features ◆◆◆
- An anime style hunter-themed adventure game
- Various alternative abilities system
- Costumes system with a new look, and a higher increase in abilities levels
- Reincarnation system to maintain character's strength. You can start over with the same status if you find it difficult to progress in the next level

◆◆◆ Skills and Abilities System ◆◆◆
- Tons of skills and abilities for you to discover and upgrade to increase your levels
- You can choose to upgrade as you like, creating your own play style
- Combining the capability of each ability to achieve the strongest form of fighting
